titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the case of United States v. Knox.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6869-6871)
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/14/1994--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Department of Justice should accept the opinion of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit in United States v. Knox and should oppose any effort by the defendant, or any other party, to overturn the decision in that case.
